mapper.insert: insert into orders (tableware_status, delivery_status, pay_method, pay_status, number, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, amount, remark, phone, address, consignee, estimated_delivery_time, delivery_time, pack_amount, tableware_number) VALUES (#{tablewareStatus}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{payMethod}, #{payStatus}, #{number}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{consignee}, #{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{deliveryTime}, #{packAmount}, #{tablewareNumber})
